programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes an energizing tailgate lunch for a crew of cowboy fixers; dishes include poppin' pork chop sandwiches, roasted corn with four-chili butter, mini lemon lime cupcakes and frontier-style jalapeno berry lemonade.

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: Michael Symon and Esther Choi begin the second shift with two chefs in a head-to-head elimination that tests simplicity; the 12 remaining chefs face a tricky taste test from judge Graham Elliot.

programme.title: 24 in 24: Last Chef Standing
programme.desc: In a shift that tests resourcefulness, Michael Symon and Esther Choi ask the 11 remaining chefs to create a three-course meal worthy of a black-tie event in 60 minutes; judge Jet Tila decides which chef will be clocking out.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Guy Fieri brings in four noodle-savvy chefs from across the U.S. for two rounds of noodle action.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Three all-star chefs team up with a teacher who has made a difference in their lives; Guy Fieri challenges these duos to make an elevated lunchbox meal and a strictly budgeted teacher appreciation dinner for a chance to win their educator $20,000.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Guy Fieri has plenty of deals to welcome four chefs to Flavortown Market, with red light specials in all 10 aisles; using the red light specials, the chefs must create a fried feast before making a pork dish that's limited to 11 ingredients or fewer.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Guy Fieri opens Flavortown's doors to four dessert chefs for a night of sweet treat showdowns; they hit the ground running to make a handheld fried dessert out of only ingredients they can carry and craft their signature sweets using vegetables.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: America's favorite pastime goes to Flavortown when Guy invites three former baseball players to team up with GGG all-star judges to hit a culinary home run.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Guy Fieri invites four swine-dining chefs for a shot at $20,000; over two rounds and a plethora of pork plates, competitors will have to show up and show snout if they want to win the all-bacon battle.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Three of Guy Fieri's favorite DDD chefs and three GGG winners compete in a tag-team relay to create a pork dinner; the first shift chef shops for a favorite snack food and piece of equipment selected by a roll of the old culinary dice.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: Fieri invites eight chefs to compete in a five-part tournament for a $70,000 prize; after the first round, the bottom three chefs are given 20 minutes to make a full Sunday supper in a sudden-death elimination round.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
